name: Flurry of Blows
description: When you attack, your limbs seem to blur, one strike following another faster than the eye can follow.
effect: Each time this hero makes a (1+) weapon action, roll a dice. On a 5 or more they can take the same action again without spending a hero dice, but must target the same adversary.
additionalEffect: they can make an extra action on a roll of 4 or more instead.
